content.html: I get far less done in the office than I do at home. I also miss out on a ton of stuff that makes my life a lot better, time with my son and wife. The happier I am the better I am at work. Not that hard to understand.
content.value: I get far less done in the office than I do at home. I also miss out on a ton of stuff that makes my life a lot better, time with my son and wife. The happier I am the better I am at work. Not that hard to understand.
